title: mojo.lang.Position
description:
Positions

Position describes an arbitrary source position
including the file, line, and column location.
A Position is valid if the line number is > 0.

leadingComments.title: mojo.core.Array
leadingComments.description: the comment before the AST node

tailingComments.title: mojo.core.Array
tailingComments.description:
usually exist in the end position of the AST node
and only one of the following situations:
```mojo
   a = 5 // following line comment 
```
